Posts.Content: I got my "lump" and 3 lymph nodes removed 3wks ago tomorrow......my wound in my breast is leaking , is this normal....I was at the clinic to arrange for my radiotheraphy on wednesday and the nurse sent for the surgeon who put steri strips over the wound and I have to go back and see him at a clinic this wed coming.....   The wound is leaking quite badly and its like dark blood, not bright red......I'm still not allowed to have a shower or wash this....grrrr!!!!!......The lymph node cut is healing fine.....My boob is still very bruised and very sore.....I know these things take time to heal, but did not think it should be leaking like this...
Posts.Title: Advice please-wound leaking

Posts.Content: Hi Amanda   I went for a routine mamagram 3 wks ago then had a recall was told I had to have a biopsy  and a scan which was done that day went for the results on Fri 13th April (what a date) and was told I had breast cancer I was taken into hospital on the 16th April and had some lymph nodes removed, and the lump removed ...got home on the 17th April and am so, so , sore and bewildered this has been such a shock to myself and family and have not really taken anything in, I get the results of all this next Friday I do know I have to get radiotherapy, ..no mention of chemo so far....I have had no contact with my own doctor or anyone at the surgery...my family have been so suportive, but I live on my own and finding things very hard Im not sleeping and really dont want to eat either and have not been out of the house since the operation on Monday I hate not being able to do normal things..ive been told not to lift shopping, cook or hoover etc......I really, really need help and advice..... Irene G
Posts.Title: Scared!!
